mermaid:
erDiagram
    customers {
        UUID customer_id PK
        TEXT name
        TEXT email
        TEXT phone_number
    }
    slots {
        UUID slot_id PK
        TIMESTAMP start_time
        TIMESTAMP end_time
        INTEGER capacity
        BOOLEAN is_sold_out
    }
    reservations {
        UUID reservation_id PK
        UUID customer_id FK
        UUID slot_id FK
        INTEGER number_of_people
        TIMESTAMP reservation_date
    }
    sold_out_settings {
        UUID sold_out_id PK
        UUID slot_id FK
        DATE sold_out_date
    }
    system_logs {
        UUID log_id PK
        TEXT log_level
        TEXT log_message
        TIMESTAMP log_time
    }
    customers ||--o{ reservations : makes
    slots ||--o{ reservations : has
    slots ||--o{ sold_out_settings : contains
